items.sentence: There\'s nothing left that needs to be done today.
I think Tom will very likely not be here tomorrow.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary used to live in Boston.
Tom didn\'t know that what he was doing was wrong.
Would you like to get together again next weekend?
Tom might\'ve said more, but Mary interrupted him.
Tom used to smoke three packs of cigarettes a day.
Tom usually calls Mary every evening after dinner.
Tom volunteers at a homeless shelter twice a week.
I don\'t know whether Tom still lives here or not.
